original_text: So lions will come out of the forest to attack them. Wolves will come from the desert to destroy them. Leopards will wait outside their cities. They will kill anyone who goes outside. 5: The wild animals (lions, wolves and leopards) are probably pictures of Judah's enemies. That will happen because the people have turned against the Lord. They have done many bad things. So lions will come out of the forest to attack them.
korean_text: 그러므로 수풀에서 나오는 사자가 그들을 죽이며 사막의 이리가 그들을 멸하며 표범이 성읍들을 엿본즉 그리로 나오는 자마다 찢기리니 이는 그들의 허물이 많고 반역이 심함이니이다

sentences.original_text: So lions will come out of the forest
Wolves will come from the desert
Leopards will wait outside their cities
sentences.korean_translation: 표범들이 그들의 성 밖에서 기다릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will kill anyone who goes outside
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 밖으로 나가는 사람을 누구든 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: The wild animals are probably pictures of Judah's enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 야생 동물들은 아마도 유다의 원수들의 그림일 것이다

sentences.original_text: because the people have turned against the Lord
They have done many bad things
So lions will come out of the forest
